item.title: BB、花旗和 Vert 被列为 AgroGalaxy 最大的债权人之一
item.description: 贷款人巴西银行（Banco do Brasil SA）和花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）是 AgroGalaxy Participacoes SA 最大的债权人之一，该公司是最新一家申请破产保护的巴西农业公司。【原文：Lenders Banco do Brasil SA and Citigroup Inc are among the largest creditors of AgroGalaxy Participacoes SA, the latest Brazilian agriculture company to file for bankruptcy protection.】

item.title: 巴菲特会怎么做？人工智能驱动的 ETF 将询问聊天机器人
item.description:
新的人工智能ETF能否模仿巴菲特的投资成功？另外，价值型股票再次受到青睐......

Can a new AI-powered ETF mimic Warren Buffett’s investment success? Plus, value stocks are in favor...again.

】

item.title: 奇货通讯股市为何如火箭般腾飞
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 降息后小额债券将保持低价
item.description: 与应税债务相比，市政债券看起来很有吸引力，其估值处于或接近今年最便宜的水平。【原文：Municipal bonds are looking attractive compared to taxable debt, with valuations at or close to their cheapest levels this year.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行称降息意味着购买贴现银行股票的时机已到
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）的分析师说，现在是股票投资者撤出溢价交易的加拿大银行，转而投资打折银行的时候了，理由是利率降低和经济风险缓解，给便宜的股票带来了更多的盈利上升空间。【原文：Now is the time for equity investors to move out of premium-traded Canadian banks and into discounted banks, analysts at Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce said, citing lower interest rates and easing of economic risks that give the cheaper stocks more earnings upside.】

item.title: 谷歌面临欧盟最后通牒，搜索主导地位再遭攻击
item.description: 除非这家美国巨头迅速采取行动，在其庞大的搜索帝国中给予竞争对手更多的关注，否则谷歌将再次受到欧盟监督机构的攻击，为巨额罚款和责令其改变商业模式铺平道路。【原文：Google is set to be hit by another attack from European Union watchdogs, paving the way for a hefty fine and an order to change its business model unless the US giant takes rapid action to give more prominence to rivals across its sprawling search empire.】

item.title: 55 年来最干旱的一个月导致波哥大加强水资源控制
item.description: 哥伦比亚首都波哥大半个多世纪以来降雨量最少，导致水库水位无法恢复，因此波哥大正在加紧限制用水。【原文：Colombia’s capital Bogotá is tightening restrictions on water use after the lowest rainfall in more than half a century stops low reservoir levels from recovering.】

item.title: 这款新电子游戏实际上是 50 款新电子游戏
item.description:
《UFO 50》可能会让您怀念那些从未存在过的游戏

。【原文：

UFO 50 might make you nostalgic for games that never actually existed

】

item.title: 美国加大对俄罗斯石油制裁的压力
item.description: 美国已要求至少一家航运保险公司提供其怀疑可能违反俄罗斯石油制裁的 14 家公司的信息，这表明西方政府仍在试图限制莫斯科出口燃料的方式。【原文：The US has asked at least one shipping insurer for information on 14 companies it suspects may have violated sanctions on Russian oil, a sign Western governments are still trying to limit the ways Moscow exports its fuels.】

item.title: 德国政府暂时不会出售更多德国商业银行股票
item.description: 德国政府决定暂时不再出售德国商业银行股份公司的股份。【原文：The German government has decided not to sell any more shares in Commerzbank AG for the time being.】

item.title: Equinor 和 RWE 将不再推进通往欧洲的氢气管道项目
item.description: Equinor ASA公司表示，该公司将不再推进与合作伙伴RWE AG公司共同建设一条将氢气从挪威输送到德国的管道的计划。【原文：Equinor ASA said that it won’t be moving ahead with plans to build a pipeline to carry hydrogen from Norway to Germany with partner RWE AG.】

item.title: 征服在线扑克的俄罗斯机器人军团
item.description:
一个会打牌的西伯利亚人工智能是如何战胜世界上最聪明的研究人员并赚取数百万美元的？【原文：

How a card-playing Siberian AI outsmarted the world’s brightest researchers and raked in millions.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚工党建议打击社交媒体和诈骗行为
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对拟议中的澳大利亚隐私法颇有微词，该法规定对不合规的科技公司处以高额罚款。但首先...【原文：Elon Musk has a choice word for proposed Australian privacy laws that feature hefty fines for noncompliant tech firms. But first...】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）在十月会议前缩小放宽贷款罚金的选择范围
item.description: 国际货币基金组织正在集中精力研究一套方案，以减轻其对希望摆脱财政困难的国家施加的额外债务负担，同时寻求解决关于其现行制度惩罚性过强的抱怨。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is focusing on a set of options to ease the additional debt burden it imposes on nations looking to escape financial distress, as it seeks to address complaints that its current system is overly punitive.】

item.title: 安大略省教师退休金计划二十年后出售巴西购物中心股份
item.description: 加拿大最大的机构投资者之一--安大略教师退休金计划公司（Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan）将出售其在 2006 年首次投资的巴西购物中心运营商 Multiplan Empreendimentos Imobiliarios SA 公司的全部股份。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan, one of Canada’s largest institutional investors, is set to unload its entire stake in Multiplan Empreendimentos Imobiliarios SA, the Brazilian mall operator it first invested in 2006.】

item.title: 美元面对美联储减息的韧性令交易员失望
item.description: 在美联储降息半个百分点之后，美元依然保持坚挺，因此大举押注美元走软的交易商正面临失望— 至少目前是这样— 。【原文：Traders betting big on a weaker dollar are facing disappointment — at least for now — as the greenback remains resilient following the Federal Reserve’s half-point interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 戴蒙表示对降息后的软着陆持怀疑态度
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，他仍然对美联储四年多来首次降息后美国经济软着陆持怀疑态度，并称他不会 "指望 "这一结果。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said he remains skeptical about a soft landing in the US following the Federal Reserve’s first rate cut in more than four years — and said he wouldn’t “count my eggs” on that outcome.】

item.title: 大豆回调，美国快速收割令期货承压
item.description: 大豆期货下跌，原因是美国的快速收割步伐盖过了对南美干旱天气的担忧。【原文：Soybean futures fell as the fast pace of the harvest in the US overshadowed concerns over dry weather in South America.】

item.title: 什么是 "四方 "联盟，为什么中国不喜欢它？
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登定于9月21日主持 "四方 "领导人峰会。这个非正式的集团将美国、日本、印度和澳大利亚聚集在一起，组成了一个民主国家联盟，在太平洋和印度洋拥有共同的经济和安全利益。该联盟的正式宗旨是维护 "自由开放的印度洋-太平洋"，但其未明言的首要任务是对抗中国日益增长的实力。不出所料，这让北京领导层感到不快。四国联盟也有批评者，他们认为【原文：US President Joe Biden is scheduled to host a summit Sept. 21 of the leaders of “the Quad.” The informal grouping brings together the US, Japan, India and Australia in an alliance of democracies with shared economic and security interests that span the Pacific and Indian Oceans. The point officially is to maintain a “free and open Indo-Pacific,” but the unstated priority is countering China’s growing power. Unsurprisingly, that rankles the leadership in Beijing. The Quad has its critics, who que】

item.title: 赞比亚矿工抵制国家增持资源股份
item.description: 赞比亚矿业公司与政府举行了会议，以解决在拟议的法律修改问题上的分歧，该修改有可能使国家获得更大份额的矿产资源。【原文：Zambian mining companies met with the government to resolve differences over a proposed legal change that would potentially give the state a bigger share of its mineral resources.】

item.title: 高盛集团的鲁布纳认为 S&P 指数在经历一些颠簸后，将在年底达到 6,000 点
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US stocks should rally into the end of the year, but not before fighting through an unfavorable near-term setup driven by technical positioning, fund flows and pre-election anxiety, according to Scott Rubner, managing director for global markets and tactical specialist at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: Stifel 的班尼斯特说：股票反弹就像点阵图 "土拨鼠日
item.description: 但在 Stifel, Nicolaus & Co. 的巴里-班尼斯特（Barry Bannister）看来，这轮涨势就像上世纪 90 年代的网络泡沫重演。【原文：Bulls are charging around in stock-market forecasts, but to Stifel, Nicolaus & Co.’s Barry Bannister, this rally looks like a 1990s dot-com bubble all over again.】

item.title: 阿姆洛呼吁继续向墨西哥石油公司提供现金援助
item.description: 墨西哥总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）表示，在当选总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）于 10 月份上台后，应继续向国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）注入现金。【原文：Mexico’s President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said cash injections to state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos should continue after President-Elect Claudia Sheinbaum takes power in October.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行必须为通胀更加波动的时代做好准备
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，在通胀更加不稳定、货币政策传导更加不明确的时代，欧洲央行必须认真思考如何应对风险和不确定性。【原文：The European Central Bank must think hard about how it deals with risks and uncertainty in an era of more-volatile inflation and less clarity about monetary-policy transmission, President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 桑德韦尔将退出数十个国家，更换首席执行官进行全面改革
item.description: 技术公司 Sandvine 因向专制政府销售产品而饱受批评，在此之后，该公司宣布全面改革业务模式并更换领导层。【原文：The technology company Sandvine has announced an overhaul of its business model and a change in leadership following years of criticism over its sales to authoritarian governments.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡债权人赢得放弃纽约债券法的选择权
item.description: 南亚岛国斯里兰卡债务重组所产生的债券的法律变更可能会为主权债务合同开创先例。【原文：A legal change in the bonds that will emerge from a debt restructuring in the South Asian island of Sri Lanka could set a precedent for sovereign debt contracts.】

item.title: 俄罗斯输往中国的天然气将提前达产
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）与中国石油天然气集团公司（China National Petroleum Corp.【原文：Russia’s Gazprom PJSC agreed with China National Petroleum Corp. to ramp up gas flows on the Power of Siberia pipeline to maximum capacity by year’s end, ahead of schedule.】

item.title: 尽管东部政府颁布禁令，利比亚石油出口仍出现反弹
item.description: 尽管利比亚东部当局尚未解除对石油外流的限制，但利比亚的石油出口量在过去一周仍有所上升。【原文：Libya’s oil exports have risen over the past week even though authorities in the east of the country haven’t lifted restrictions on outward flows.】

item.title: Amundi 押注墨西哥比索，赌大跌结束
item.description: Amundi SA 正在加大对墨西哥比索的押注，赌四个月来最严重的暴跌已经过去。【原文：Amundi SA is ramping up its bet on the Mexican peso, wagering the worst of a four-month selloff has passed.】

item.title: 尽管进行了海军演习，船只仍在希腊近海为俄罗斯石油提供开关
item.description: 尽管希腊进行了旨在遏制此类活动的军事演习，但运载俄罗斯石油的油轮仍在希腊南海岸与其他船只进行货物交换。【原文：Tankers carrying Russian oil are still conducting cargo switches with other vessels off Greece’s south coast, despite Greek military drills aimed at deterring such activities.】
